name: Broadway Legend Ellena
storyline: Ellena Stevens is a girl who has always dreamed of being a Broadway star, and one day she is approached by a man named J. Sinatra who asks if she would like to know how to become a dancer worthy of Broadway. Ellena accepts his offer, and is tasked with training against six other dancers (including himself) from around the globe in order to fulfill her goal of becoming a star.
summary: Broadway Legend Ellena is a rhythm game released in the Disc Station magazine for PC-98 computers in 1994. The title character, Ellena Stevens, would later cameo in Puyo Puyo DA! for the Sega Dreamcast.
